mapper.update:
UPDATE tty_sys_operlog
USER_ID = #{userId},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName},
DISPLAY_NAME = #{displayName},
IP = #{ip},
IS_ADMIN = #{isAdmin},
OPER_DESC = #{operDesc},
OPER_TIME = #{operTime},
OPER_TYPE = #{operType},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
where ID = #{id}
